```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(reshape2)
```

```{r}
etabar <- 5
N <- 10000
eta <- c()
Delta <- 1
```

```{r}
for(j in 1:N){
	eta[j] <- etabar + Delta * atan(pi/2 * (2*j - N -1)/(N + 1))
}

eta.m <- melt(eta)
ggplot(eta.m, aes(value)) +
	geom_histogram(bins = 250)
```
